message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am confident it would serve you exceptionally well. Given its significance and the fact that it's tailored to meet your specific needs, I propose a price of $950,000. This offer reflects not only the product's worth but also acknowledges the importance of making such a significant acquisition accessible to you. I look forward to discussing this further and exploring how we can make this transaction beneficial for both parties.
